videos.description: 1H (10:33) TAMU Admon Gilder made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Tonny Trocha-Morelos.
videos.headline: Admon Gilder sinks 3 point jumper

videos.description: 1H (9:21) ARIZ Dusan Ristic made Dunk. Assisted by Rawle Alkins.
videos.headline: Texas A&M responds to dunk from Arizona with even more explosive slam
Lengthy pass sequence leads to dunk by Keanu Pinder

videos.description: In the second half, Arizona's Kadeem Allen steals the ball and feeds it to an open Kobi Simmons for an easy dunk against Texas A&M.
videos.headline: Allen's steal leads to Arizona dunk

videos.description: 2H (11:27) ARIZ Lauri Markkanen made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Rawle Alkins.
videos.headline: Lauri Markkanen sinks big 3-point jumper

videos.description: Kobi Simmons extends Arizona's big lead with a fancy up-and-under layup.
videos.headline: Simmons streaks to the rim for up-and-under layup
Tyler Davis gets through double team for chance to go for 3

videos.description: 2H (0:24) TAMU DJ Hogg made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Tonny Trocha-Morelos.
videos.headline: DJ Hogg makes huge 3-point jumper to bring A&M back to only 2 points behind

videos.description: No. 19 Arizona has four starters reach double digits but near squander a double-digit lead late in the second off of a 67-63 win over Texas A&M.
videos.headline: Arizona holds off late charge to beat Texas A&M
